CRUN is a simple command line tool to spin up blockchain node. It is designed to be simple and easy to use.

Valley of Namada is an Ubuntu CLI-based tool for managing Namada nodes, executing transactions, and handling wallet/key interactions. It simplifies node deployment, key management, and staking while operating locally to reduce hack risks. As an open-source script, it ensures security and transparency.
